plot_imf¶

gwasr.utils.plot_utils.plot_imf(pred, pred_name, imf_ia, imf_ia_name, gps1, samp_freq, title, plot_name, save_path)¶

Plot of the instantaneous amplitude and predictor.

Parameters
prednumpy array

predictor

pred_namestr

predictor name

imf_ianumpy array

imf instantaneous amplitude

imf_ia_namestr

imf instantaneous amplitude name

gps1int

gps of the event

samp_freqint

sampling frequency

titlestr

plot title

plot_namestr

plot name

save_pathstr

save path
